name: Easy Can You Believe They All Turn 30? Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the last to turn 30 years old?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	They threw her a party in her apartment and Monica made chocolate chip pancakes.

questions.text: Who cried out to God when they turned 30?
On Monica's 30th birthday, did Ross tell his parents that Monica was drunk?
Who visited their sister on their 30th birthday?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	When Phoebe wished Ursula a happy 30th birthday, Ursula told her they were really 31.

True.

	She didn't think Tag was the right man for her to marry or have children with.

questions.text: Who broke into a mini-van that was blocking Ross' new sports car that he bought for his birthday?
questions.explanation:
Phoebe.

	She used a Slim Jim to break into it, but when she opened the door an alarm went off and she screamed for everyone to run.

questions.text: Who cried at Chandler's birthday before Chandler had a chance to blow out his candles?
How long ago did Rachel give the gang a list of birthday presents she wanted?
What did Joey give Chandler for his last birthday?
Who made a deal with God never to turn 31?
questions.explanation:
Joey.

	Joey (looking up to the sky): "We made a deal."
